# TextFragment constructor

create a new instance of a text fragment

```csharp
internal TextFragment(string text, bool ismatch)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| text | text fragment |
| ismatch | Match status. true if fragment matches a pattern; false otherwise |
